name: Messenger0
body: ### Messenger for Power PC A simple & beautiful app for Facebook Messenger. Chat without distractions on any OS. ### Texting and so much more Know when people have seen your texts. Make HD calls anywhere in the world. Snap photos and shoot videos. Choose from thousands of stickers. Record voice messages. Chat with your favorite groups.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
